ResourceHeader.Description: Van Allen Probe A, Summary Plots of Ion fluxes measured by the Relativistic Electron Proton Telescope (REPT), which is one of three instruments on the Energetic Particle, Composition and Thermal Plasma Suite (ECT)

PublicationInfo.PublishedBy: Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory
